  • Class
    Description
    ConnectionErrorException
     
    Federation
    Helper class for resolving Stellar addresses.
    FederationResponse
    Object to hold a response from a federation server.
    FederationServer
    FederationServer handles a network connection to a federation server instance and exposes an interface for requests to that instance.
    FederationServerInvalidException
    Federation server is invalid (malformed URL, not HTTPS, etc.)
    MalformedAddressException
    Given Stellar address is malformed.
    NoFederationServerException
    Federation server was not found in stellar.toml file.
    NotFoundException
    Stellar address not found by federation server
    ServerErrorException
    Federation server responded with error
    StellarTomlNotFoundInvalidException
    Stellar.toml file was not found or was malformed.
